cause.description:
This cause encourages its members to do what they can for their society. When an opportunity presents itself, take advantage of it. Help out in your community, voluteer, be kind to a stranger. Do what you can to make this world a happier and better place.
1. A random act of kindness ripples through society
cause.mission: make the world a better place one act at a time
cause.name: Random Acts Of Kindness
